se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security

Class SecurityCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.sensiblethings.disseminationlayer.communication.Communication
      • se.sensiblethings.disseminationslayer.communication.security.SecurityCommunication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    se.sensiblethings.disseminationlayer.disseminationcore.MessageListener

    public class SecurityCommunication
extends se.sensiblethings.disseminationlayer.communication.Communication
implements se.sensiblethings.disseminationlayer.disseminationcore.MessageListener
    SecurityCommunication.java This class extends the Communication class, to make itself to be one of the communication that could be used. While it doesn't really implement its own communication, it uses the RUDP as its bottom communication implementation. It also implements the MessageListener to acts as a middlerware to exchange the certificates and session keys between each node. initCommunicationPort specify the real communication(RUDP) port, default is 0;

    initSecurityLevel specify the security level pre-defined in the configuration file (SecurityConfiguration.xml). The default setting is 2, which uses the RC4 as the symmetric encryption.

    uci specify the itself uci. It should be pre-defined before the instantiation of the SensibleThingsPlatform.

    Author:
    Hao
